Service playbooks

Choose the engagement style that fits your launch roadmap. Every package includes dashboards, SOPs, and weekly video reports.

01 · Review Lab Retainer

Research-backed reviews and comparison pages crafted to rank quickly and convince readers with authenticity.

  • Editorial calendar & persona docs
  • Hands-on product testing checklist
  • Schema, tables, multimedia briefs
  • QA + optimization roadmap

02 · Launch Accelerator

Lifecycle campaigns for new affiliate offers, bundling landing pages, email swipes, webinar decks, and UGC collaborations.

  • Offer audit & messaging pillars
  • Copy + design direction in Figma
  • Automation & tracking setup
  • Partner onboarding toolkit

03 · Optimization Sprint

A 4-week engagement to refresh content libraries, rebuild conversion elements, and tighten analytics.

  • Heatmap & SERP diagnostics
  • Speed + UX backlog
  • Affiliate link QA + monetization ideas
  • Refresh calendar & Loom walkthroughs

Engagement Process

Discovery

We align on your revenue KPIs, affiliate mix, timelines, and available assets. Expect a Notion dashboard within 48 hours.

Build

Sprints of 1–2 weeks produce content, CRO changes, and tracking updates. Every task includes owner, deadline, and QA status.

Scale

We run refresh cadences, GTM experiments, and partner enablement. Optional co-creation with your in-house writers or designers.
